exchange_shop.name: Choose from this equipment
exchange_shop.description: 4th ANNIVERSARY ドリームセレクション装備召喚【超絶】

soul_strike.name: Lucrecia's Lament
soul_strike.description: Deal six ranged physical or magic fire and non-elemental attacks to all targets, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, temporarily infuse the user with the power of fire, and enter Hellhound EX mode. Hellhound EX mode temporarily raises the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount, and reduces delay of the user's next action after using a fire attack. Type of damage dealt and stat raised depends on the user's stats.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal six ranged physical or magic fire and non-elemental attacks to all targets, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, temporarily infuse the user with the power of fire, and enter Hellhound EX mode. Hellhound EX mode temporarily raises the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount, and reduces delay of the user's next action after using a fire attack. Type of damage dealt and stat raised depends on the user's stats.

soul_strike.name: Climirage
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen physical wind attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, and enter True Form EX Mode. True Form EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Attack a moderate amount, and causes their wind abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Air Hazard, dealing four or eight physical wind and non-elemental attacks that can break the damage cap.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen physical wind attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, and enter True Form EX Mode. True Form EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Attack a moderate amount, and causes their wind abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Air Hazard, dealing four or eight physical wind and non-elemental attacks that can break the damage cap.

soul_strike.name: Innocent Cure
soul_strike.description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their physical attacks for three turns, and grant them Last Stand.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their physical attacks for three turns, and grant them Last Stand.

soul_strike.name: Clearest Tranquil
soul_strike.description: Instantly deal eight physical water and non-elemental attacks to one target, lower its Attack and Defense a large amount, and restore a moderate amount of HP to all allies based on their max HP.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly deal eight physical water and non-elemental attacks to one target, lower its Attack and Defense a large amount, and restore a moderate amount of HP to all allies based on their max HP.

soul_strike.name: Dynamite Boost
soul_strike.description: Deal ten jump wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and temporarily remove delay of the user's jump attacks.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten jump wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and temporarily remove delay of the user's jump attacks.

soul_strike.name: Meteor Combo
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical earth and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, raise their Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and temporarily cause their monk abilities to double cast.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical earth and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, raise their Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and temporarily cause their monk abilities to double cast.

soul_strike.name: Turk Special
soul_strike.description: Deal ten ranged physical or magic lightning and non-elemental attacks to one target, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, temporarily infuse the user with the power of lightning, raise the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn when using lightning attacks. Attack type and stats increased depends on the user's stats.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten ranged physical or magic lightning and non-elemental attacks to one target, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, temporarily infuse the user with the power of lightning, raise the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn when using lightning attacks. Attack type and stats increased depends on the user's stats.

soul_strike.name: Zanshin
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen ranged physical dark attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, set the user's critical hit chance to 50%, and enter Legendary SOLDIER EX Mode. Legendary SOLDIER EX Mode temporarily allows the user's physical dark attacks to break the damage cap, and causes every second dark ability used by the user to increase the user's dark damage a moderate amount on the next turn.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen ranged physical dark attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, set the user's critical hit chance to 50%, and enter Legendary SOLDIER EX Mode. Legendary SOLDIER EX Mode temporarily allows the user's physical dark attacks to break the damage cap, and causes every second dark ability used by the user to increase the user's dark damage a moderate amount on the next turn.

soul_strike.name: Heartless Angel
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen physical dark attacks to one enemy, temporarily grant the user Empowered Infusion for the dark, lower the Defense and Resistance of the user a small amount, and raise their Attack a large amount.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen physical dark attacks to one enemy, temporarily grant the user Empowered Infusion for the dark, lower the Defense and Resistance of the user a small amount, and raise their Attack a large amount.

soul_strike.name: Height of Anger
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen ranged physical fire and wind attacks to random enemies, briefly lower their Defense and Resistance a very large amount, and remove delay from the actions of all allies for one turn.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen ranged physical fire and wind attacks to random enemies, briefly lower their Defense and Resistance a very large amount, and remove delay from the actions of all allies for one turn.

soul_strike.name: Hidden Bloom
soul_strike.description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, automatically heal damage they take (up to 2000 HP in total), and grant them Shell.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, automatically heal damage they take (up to 2000 HP in total), and grant them Shell.

soul_strike.name: Mighty Warrior
soul_strike.description: Grant Haste to all allies, temporarily raise their Attack a moderate amount and Defense and Resistance a small amount, and grant them a barrier that enables them to avoid one debuff.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Grant Haste to all allies, temporarily raise their Attack a moderate amount and Defense and Resistance a small amount, and grant them a barrier that enables them to avoid one debuff.

soul_strike.name: Climhazzard Xeno
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical wind and non-elemental attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their wind resistance level by 2, raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, and temporarily cause the user's wind attacks to reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical wind and non-elemental attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their wind resistance level by 2, raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, and temporarily cause the user's wind attacks to reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn.

soul_strike.name: Danger Dice
soul_strike.description: Temporarily lower the Attack, Magic, Defense, and Resistance of all enemies a large amount, and grant Protect, Shell, and Haste to all allies.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Temporarily lower the Attack, Magic, Defense, and Resistance of all enemies a large amount, and grant Protect, Shell, and Haste to all allies.

soul_strike.name: Ultra Cross Slash
soul_strike.description: Deal five physical wind and dark attacks to one target, temporarily set the user's critical hit chance to 100%, and enter SOLDIER EX Mode. SOLDIER EX Mode temporarily increases the damage of most of the user's physical attacks by a moderate amount, and enables the user to break the damage cap.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal five physical wind and dark attacks to one target, temporarily set the user's critical hit chance to 100%, and enter SOLDIER EX Mode. SOLDIER EX Mode temporarily increases the damage of most of the user's physical attacks by a moderate amount, and enables the user to break the damage cap.

soul_strike.name: Freewheeling Gauntlet
soul_strike.description: Deal ten ranged physical water and non-elemental attacks to one target, grant Mirror Image to the user, enabling them to avoid one physical attack, temporarily infuse the user with the power of water, and cause the user's water abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Torrent Blade, dealing four, six, or eight ranged physical water and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the Mirror Image stacks on the user.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten ranged physical water and non-elemental attacks to one target, grant Mirror Image to the user, enabling them to avoid one physical attack, temporarily infuse the user with the power of water, and cause the user's water abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Torrent Blade, dealing four, six, or eight ranged physical water and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the Mirror Image stacks on the user.

soul_strike.name: Meteodrive
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical earth and non-elemental attacks to one target, and temporarily grant Haste, a barrier that reflects damage, and major Regen to all allies.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical earth and non-elemental attacks to one target, and temporarily grant Haste, a barrier that reflects damage, and major Regen to all allies.
